EmailTemplate.name: RE: Referral from Barrett Langston - Turbonomic (1494852273.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Referral from Barrett Langston - Turbonomic (1494852273.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Cedar, With the large investment you and the team have made in virtualization I think that there could be a lot of potential value that you and the team could see after implementing Turbonomic. Below is a video that BMC and Turbonomic released last week where the CIO, Scott Crowder discusses how Turbonomic allows them to increase the capacity of the infrastructure by 25% while also increasing the performance of the mission critical applications. https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/cloud-economics-on-prem-or-off-with-turbonomic-bmc/ <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/cloud-economics-on-prem-or-off-with-turbonomic-bmc/]]> This can help you and the team free up budget for other areas of IT and allows teams to spend less on hardware year of year. Do you have time for my team and I to provide an introduction to the platform over the next couple of weeks? I am confident you will find it valuable. Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Tuesday, May 9, 2017 8:37 AM To: 'krausce@collierschools.com' <krausce@collierschools.com> Subject: RE: Referral from Barrett Langston - Turbonomic Hi Cedar, Following up on the email below, I wanted to see if you had some time this week or next to discuss Turbonomic and discuss why so many counties/public schools in Florida and around the country have implemented our platform into their infrastructure. Even if the timing is off due to other projects going on, I’d still be happy to set up an educational overview of the platform and discuss how we allow teams to have better control over their virtualized infrastructure, including large VDI environments. If after the call it is not a fit for the moment, I promise to respect your time and walk away. Garland, Texas Saves More Than $200,000 with Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5TdcPNL1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhWGUCnSzj6oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5yghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSZrl2U003o2AyXGGZYt%5FiB30iSKKxyteRQtnsuxloKSs792mftzoUvhHMB%2DMVvoBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmjl3dget0XRS2SiwAE%5FnYjh%5Fhe74TeqCycXijuHALTmCf%2DxQzzG5cAy1WGsvkStCnaGxXs8rZ3UHKMCauZ6gg%2C/j0xQcMDII1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpxd9z2kdwZunBLA76mN9eHZYhKt2LEwAfHZ9syQ8VOemBZadB6PlcBUX%5Fay78g6TJfMB9ZbthxY9x%2D6761WsRlcmNmQGeEXova0tmRwW4R4Yvog%2D2Z4Q6Xi%2DGwnPNP6MQnRIdgqko%2DIqMb724qHCKwFffxQCpHVBx0cbeuXj5X70%2C]]> (not a Florida use case but I thought you’d find it interesting) Cedar, how does your calendar look over the next few weeks for an initial call? Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Friday, May 5, 2017 9:01 AM To: 'krausce@collierschools.com' <krausce@collierschools.com <[[mailto:krausce@collierschools.com]]>> Subject: Referral from Barrett Langston - Turbonomic Cedar – After speaking with Barrett Langston I wanted to reach out to see if you had some time over the next couple of weeks to discuss why other Florida countie public schools like Orange County Public School, Seminole County Public Schools have invested in our software to enable the infrastructure teams to increase application performance while increasing efficiency within their infrastructure. Seminole County Public Schools: <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jEtWdsbOI1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhRDkK6Vj7tlIHKbJ5MP7th24d09qz4iCYAssmQkwHhPWIXRllCfT%5FPZbQQsBS1HYonBwGw3GvDEosorBwMjJAO58eFSYaj10eO%5FGqUxSGgE2QtyeLK4nGICJNGr%5F0IhUwe438SerPYsRyU7591sAgx2L9xqiZ29K4iechlxgezZgn24N30XNE8G%2DGDuNCjv%5FADeRw60pEvTEPEEAnqG4ywV3NI%5FBzVoxAWBQpnBAReIcUmljezs3ptWuw7YTi8miABzG0s5K9v9r%5FhiCLIfXq4bjDHtk32lknmbw%2C%2C/j0FVcsLGLllNoVdlsbPWJbvomjvDc4qrt7kzH%5Fryx9081gZ9feGAPVn7jcFfHZ5%5FaeCQCkwaAIBgnxlKFr2daJRQ6bAOKgTgfn6tprXPfY9Bf7t%2D1cIv%5FKeonTIjvc3PkVPCHUoAVDQ%2DQhONZbAhgC6iYrYXShGF9XXOOI4g0RsrtY5J5Yeofran6D6T4UvU9XueMFc76cqP1UizB8Q4g%2DIglHsuy1R3T%2DHg1jndh%2D4HrC9u2P1lyE5N%2DMRkEMhCpUGvfXTn3bfBGrpDV56EpfHrlcgORh87voJrKEqUen8%2C]]> With Turbonomic’s real-time capacity management to simulate a migration from old Dell hosts to new Cisco UCS blades, the team learned they could consolidate from 12 hosts down to 3, enabling them to save nearly $80,000. These funds can now be reallocated to new projects focused on innovation, such as collapsing and centralizing much of their remote site infrastructure to enable more unified IT management. I was hoping that you might have 30 minutes for an introduction to the platform to see if we could provide the same value that the other Florida counties/public schools have seen from Turbonomic. With the large investment the team has made in VMware and Citrix XenServer I think there would be many great use cases to cover. Do you have 30 minutes for an introduction next week? Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5TdcPNL1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhWGUCnSzj6oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5yghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSZrl2U003o2AyXGGZYt%5FiB30iSKKxyteRQtnsuxloKSs792mftzoUvhHMB%2DMVvoBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmjl3dget0XRS2SiwAE%5FnYjh%5Fhe74TeqCycXijuHALTmCf%2DxQzzG5cAy1WGsvkStCnaGxXs8rZ3UHKMCauZ6gg%2C/j0lZdsHKI1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMJNE7jVXPNLEK5RZ%2D9lcM0m%2DUh%5FMgZvPaJliX6xUzs9trKuP7XMcg%2Dilu13APEhLE1UpNyLeZbA3gS%2DqOZ4lTQKU7mnUNpM2ji1FhrIXwoE%2C]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5TdcPNL1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhWGUCnSzj6oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5yghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSZrl2U003o2AyXGGZYt%5FiB30iSKKxyteRQtnsuxloKSs792mftzoUvhHMB%2DMVvoBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmjl3dget0XRS2SiwAE%5FnYjh%5Fhe74TeqCycXijuHALTmCf%2DxQzzG5cAy1WGsvkStCnaGxXs8rZ3UHKMCauZ6gg%2C/h01TcMLNdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCwyl2I%2D%2DzTtEX7uxcJ0CKUDf1pJLbVZhJZZhdxOZz8aT220owucSrp3vlCEM7RzQ%5FQEPOTQ%2C%2C]]> Going to Cisco Live? Meet with a Turbonomic Executive <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5TdcPNL1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhWGUCnSzj6oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5yghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSZrl2U003o2AyXGGZYt%5FiB30iSKKxyteRQtnsuxloKSs792mftzoUvhHMB%2DMVvoBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmjl3dget0XRS2SiwAE%5FnYjh%5Fhe74TeqCycXijuHALTmCf%2DxQzzG5cAy1WGsvkStCnaGxXs8rZ3UHKMCauZ6gg%2C/j0hTdMTJL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqp3so%5F3U1sYeTGKAzijdZFFZw1draTChYvB59qnV5AL8G%2DRopj%2DdBzMk6UamqolLjbQ4x2ebh5%2DPJgxb2izEwrsvqQnFCfCmU7U2hFUSG0aLMVg3i0FNVwew%2C%2C]]>
